text: intent: debug why improve-web agent was idle despite 2 pending messages in messages.db

outcome: found two bugs — (1) _handle_pending_count used urgent_delivered instead of urgent_acked causing injected-but-unreplied urgents to vanish from count; (2) launcher didn't seed kg_root into mux.db after restart so pending-count always returned 0. Fixed both in mux.py and launcher.py. Agent woke after mux restart.
